settings.text: Get up to 45% off on our Valentine's Bundles until February 27 only.
Use this text to share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.heading: Subscribe to our newsletter
settings.subheading: Promotions, new products and sales. Directly to your inbox.

settings.title: Image with text
settings.text: Pair large text with an image to give focus to your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

settings.three-col-block-description: You don't have to worry about paying to get the Test Store Original Mattress to your home. Each Test Store Original Mattress is delivered quickly, free of charge. And if Test Store is not for you, we will pick it up for free and give you a full refund.

The best way to find out whether a mattress is right for you, is right from the comfort of your own home. That's why we give you 100 nights to test your Test Store Original Mattress. If you decide it's not quite right, you can send it back for free.
Each Test Store Original Mattress comes with a 10 year warranty, ensuring the longevity and quality of the mattress core.

settings.three-col-title: Leave the stress to us, not on your sleep

settings.award-section-title: Award-winning Quality German Brand Made for Filipinos
settings.award-section-description: Since the company's inception in 2015, Test Store has annually won awards for the best mattress from several consumer organizations in Europe.

settings.testimonial-text: Unlike other mattresses, they have a 7-zone foam! This is the latest feature in German sleep tech which adapts to your body, provides support, and relieves back pain and pressure. It’s the perfect balance between soft and firm that I like, and I haven’t had trouble sleeping since using it. 😌
Breakfast in my @ph.emmasleep bed. You can still use my code “BELL” for a 20% off on your new mattress. #EmmaPH
I could sleep here all day. All night. Everyday.

settings.slide_heading: Enjoy up to 50% off our products
settings.banner-big-text-dif-color: in our Biggest Sale of the Year

settings.banner-description: Designed with 7 unique zones that sink differently, creating the ultimate pressure-relieving sleep

settings.banner-description: Return any product for free within 100 days and get a full refund.
Using the latest foam technology, our mattress experts worked tirelessly to create the best mattress at an affordable price.

settings.page-content:
1. Application of these Terms and Conditions
1.1 Welcome to www.emma-sleep.com.ph (the 'Website'). The Website is owned and operated by Test Store Sleep Singapore Pte. Ltd. (Reg. No. 202022221D) (‘Test Store Sleep’). Thank you for using Test Store Sleep products and services.
1.2 The Website provides you with an opportunity to browse and purchase various products that have been listed for sale through the Website (the 'Products') by giving you access to a registered customer account (the 'Purchase Services')
1.3 Your access to and use of our Website for the purchase of Products through the Purchase Services or any associated products and services is governed by these terms and conditions (the 'Terms').
1.4 Please read the Terms carefully as they govern your access to and use of our Website. By using the Website, you agree that you are bound by these Terms. If you do not agree with the Terms, you must refrain from the using the Website.
1.5 Please read our Privacy Policy which form a part of these Terms to understand our practices regarding personal information that we collect about you through the conduct of our business.
1.6 These Terms may be updated by us at any time, and by continuing to use the Website, you accept the Terms as they apply from time to time. If Test Store Sleep updates the Terms, we will use reasonable endeavors to provide you with notice of these updates. Any changes to the Terms take immediate effect from the date of their publication on our Website.


2. Who May Use Our Website
2.1 As a condition of your use of our Website and access to our Purchase Services, you warrant that:
(a) you are a person authorised to enter into a legally binding contract if you are purchasing our Products;
(b) all relevant consents have been obtained to use our Products.
2.2 If we detect suspicious activity on this Website, we reserve the right to investigate the instance and suspend a person’s access to this Website without prior notice.
2.3 We retain the right in our sole discretion to deny anyone access to this Website or our Purchase Services, at any time and for any reason.


3. Registration and Acceptance
3.1 To obtain access to our Purchase Services, you must register for a member account through our Website (‘Customer Account’).
3.2 By registering for a Customer Account, you will be required to accept the Terms by clicking the 'register' button in the user interface as a condition of joining as a member (‘Customer’). By clicking the 'register' button you agree to all the terms and conditions listed on these Terms by Test Store Sleep which gives notice to you through our user interface as follows:
By Registering, you agree that you've read and accepted our website Terms and Conditions and you consent to our Privacy Policy.
3.3 You acknowledge that Test Store Sleep may reject your application for a Customer Account or cancel an existing Customer Account, for any reason, in our sole discretion.
3.4 You must not register for a Customer Account if you are not of legal age to form a binding contract with us or if you are a person barred from receiving the Purchase Services under Singaporean law or any other country in which you are a resident.
3.5 As part of the registration process for a Customer Account, you will be required to provide us with personal information including but not limited to:
(a) your name;
(b) email and mailing address;
(c) a geographical address;
(d) a telephone number;
(e) a preferred username and password (‘Login Details’); and
(f) and any other information indicated as required.
(‘Registration Data’)
Registration Data includes any content that you submit to Test Store Sleep including your personal data that you may submit to us through the course of us supplying Purchase Services to you. Test Store Sleep acknowledges that by you providing us with Registration Data that you are entrusting us to treat it appropriately and in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
3.6 After registration as a Customer, you may login into your Customer Account with your Login Details to gain access to the Purchase Services by placing an order (‘Order’) for our Products. A contract comes into existence for the supply of the Products once acceptance of the Order is made by Test Store Sleep. Any Order not accepted by Test Store Sleep will be regarded as having been refused by Test Store Sleep.
3.7 You are solely responsible for the accuracy of the information that you submit in relation to each Order for the Products. You agree that Test Store Sleep does not control, verify, or endorse that information.
3.8 You warrant that your Registration Data is accurate, correct and up to date. You must not submit any Registration Data that is false or inaccurate. If we detect suspicious or incomplete information, we reserve the right to cancel a Customer Account and any orders for our Products.
3.9 If your Registration Data changes, you must promptly update your Customer Account to reflect those changes. Test Store Sleep may undertake additional inquiries to confirm the accuracy of your Registration Data but is not obliged to verify Registration Data. It is your responsibility to ensure that your Registration Data is accurate and that you keep your Registration Data up to date.
3.10 You retain ownership of your Registration Data. You grant Test Store Sleep a worldwide, royalty free license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, create derivate works, make publicly available your Registration Data for the limited purposes of providing our services to you and only as permitted by our Privacy Policy. This license also extends to any trusted third parties we work with to the extent necessary to provide our services to you.
3.11 You are responsible for keeping your Login Details secure. Members acknowledge that they are entirely responsible for all activities that occur under their Login Details. Test Store Sleep will not be liable for any loss or damage from your failure to maintain the security of your Login Details. You agree to immediately notify Test Store Sleep of any unauthorised use of your Login Details or any other breach of security known to you.
3.12 You acknowledge that Test Store Sleep will use the email you provide as the primary method for communication and agree to receive e-newsletters from Test Store Sleep which will always have an unsubscribe function listed at the foot of the e-newsletter.
3.13 You are responsible for maintaining, protecting and making backups of your Registration Data. To the extent permitted by applicable law, Test Store Sleep will not be liable for any failure to store, or for loss or corruption to your Registration Data.
3.12 You acknowledge that Test Store Sleep will use the email you provide as the primary method for communication and agree to receive e-newsletters from Test Store Sleep which will always have an unsubscribe function listed at the foot of the e-newsletter.
3.13 You are responsible for maintaining, protecting and making backups of your Registration Data. To the extent permitted by applicable law, Test Store Sleep will not be liable for any failure to store, or for loss or corruption to your Registration Data.
3.14 Test Store Sleep may without notice terminate your Customer Account and your access to the Purchase Services including any Registration Data in it or associated with it:
(a) at any time for a breach of these Terms in the sole discretion of Test Store Sleep, or
(b) if there is no account activity associated with your Customer Account for over 12 months.
3.15 We may from time to time by notice on our Website vary our catalogue of available Products, the prices for our Products and offer additional products or services.


4. How the Contract is Formed
4.1 Our offer of Products on the Website constitutes an invitation to buy our Products. This means, it is not a binding offer to sell. You may submit your offer to buy via our order system integrated into our Website.
4.2 When purchasing Products via the Website, the Products you intend to purchase are placed in our virtual shopping cart (‘Shopping Cart’). You can view and access your Shopping Cart at any time and on each page of the Website and you can also make changes to your existing Shopping Cart. Once you have decided to purchase a Product in your Shopping Cart, you can enter your personal details, select the method of payment and select the shipping conditions. Prior to purchase, you can check, change, or cancel the purchase in its entirety. By clicking the “Buy now” button you make an offer to buy the Products from Test Store Sleep.
4.3 You may return to the Website before placing your Order by clicking on the “back” button found on your internet browser, after checking your information and/or close your Internet browser to cancel the order process.
4.4 Our acceptance of your Order will take place when we email you notification of our acceptance of your Order. At this point, a contract will come into existence between you and Test Store Sleep.
4.5 If we are unable to accept your offer, we will inform you of this and will not charge you for the Products. We may not be able to accept your order:
(a) because a Product is out of stock;
(b) because of unexpected limits in our resources which could not be reasonably planned for;
(c) because we have identified an error in the price or description of the Products; or
(d) because we are unable to meet a delivery deadline which you have specified.
4.6 It is always possible that, despite our best efforts, some of the Products we sell may be incorrectly priced. We will normally check prices before accepting your Order so that, where the Product’s correct price at your Order date is less than our stated price at your Order date, we will charge the lower amount. If the Product’s correct price at your date is higher than the price stated to you, we will contact you for your instructions before we accept your Order. If we accept and process your Order where a pricing error is obvious and unmistakable and could reasonably have been recognised by you as a mispricing, we may end the contract, refund you any sums you have paid and require the return of any goods provided to you.
4.7 The rights and obligations under a Contract of Sale between Test Store Sleep and You, duly concluded in accordance with these Terms and Conditions, may not be assigned or transferred to any third parties under any circumstances.


5. Prices and Shipping Costs
5.1 Prices include GST unless otherwise stated on our Website. The prices stated on the order page when you placed your Order are the final prices. They include all price components including all applicable taxes.
5.2 We ship only to Philippines, directly to your front door using our courier. You bear no responsibility for any shipping costs and returns in Philippines.


6. Delivery
6.1 We will deliver the Products to you within 2-3 business days after the day on which we accept your order.
6.2 We are not responsible for delays outside of our control. If the delivery of the Product is delayed by an event outside our control, then we will contact you as soon as possible to let you know. We will take steps to minimize the effect of the delay. Provided we do this, we will not be liable for delays caused by the event, but if there is a risk of substantial delay you may contact us to end the contract and receive a refund for any Products you have paid for but not received.
6.3 In the case of the non-availability of goods, your advance payment, if any paid, will be refunded without delay.
6.4 The Products will be your responsibility and risk in the Products will pass to you from the time we deliver the Products to the delivery address provided to us.
6.5 If, after failed delivery to you, you do not re-arrange delivery, we will contact you for further instructions. We may charge you for storage costs and any further delivery costs. If, despite our reasonable efforts, we are unable to contact you to re-arrange delivery or collection, we may end the contract and claim for any loss caused by your refusal or non-availability to take delivery. If you are in default of acceptance, we reserve the right to sell the Products to a third-party or to hold you liable for any loss.


7. Our Products
Products may vary slightly from their images on our Website. The images of the Products on our Website are for illustrative purposes only.


8. Title and Risk
8.1 We retain ownership of the purchased item until the invoice has been paid in full by you.
8.2 If you are in arrears for any payment obligations, all outstanding sums are immediately due.
8.3 The risk in the Products will pass from Test Store Sleep to you at the time of delivery of the Products to the point of delivery in the Order. From that time on, you assume all risk of loss and damage to the Products including without limitation all loss or damage in the course of unloading the Products following delivery.


9. Terms of Payment and Delivery
9.1.You agree that you will receive invoices and credit notes exclusively in electronic form.
9.2 We offer the following methods of payment:
(a) credit card (MasterCard and Visa Card);
(b) cash-on-delivery;
(c) bank transfer.
For every Order, we reserve the right not to offer certain payment methods based on the delivery address, a deviation from the delivery and invoice address, the value of the goods in the Order or due to other objective criteria. We are entitled to refer you to other payment methods for each Order.
9.3 In the case of payment in advance we will provide you with our bank details in the Order confirmation. The invoice amount must be transferred to our account within 10 days.
9.4 Consumers are asked to check the Products immediately for completeness, obvious defects and transport damage and to notify complaints to us at Contact us and the freight forwarder as soon as possible. Your warranty claims remain unaffected.


10. Returns and Refunds Policy
10.1 Returns and refunds will be processed in accordance with the Singaporean Consumer Law.
10.2 Returns and refunds may only be claimed by Test Store Sleep customers who have purchased our Products from official dealers. A Product purchased from unauthorized dealers will not be eligible for return or refund.
10.3 It is your responsibility to inspect your Products on delivery. Should your Products be defective upon receipt, not match the description or are not fit for the purpose specified, Test Store Sleep will offer a full refund, replacement or repair of the Products in accordance with its obligations under the Singaporean Consumer Law.
10.4 For defective merchandise, you must contact us within 100 calendar days of delivery to report any discrepancies or faults to make a claim.
10.5 To start the return process, email our customer service team at support@emma-sleep.com.ph and we will arrange for a pickup at no cost to you. After we initiate a return for you, our collection company will contact you via telephone within 2 – 3 working days to organise a suitable date for collection.
10.6 After the return has arrived by pickup, we will issue you a refund. A refund may take up to 2 weeks to process depending on the payment method you used.
10.7 To check the status of your refund please contact us at support@emma-sleep.com.ph.
10.8 Nothing in these Terms shall be construed as giving You an absolute right to refund. Products that have been modified or excessively handled will not be accepted as a return. Returned Products that, after inspection, are found to be not genuine Products of Test Store Sleep shall not be accepted as a return. No credit will be allowed for Products that have been used, modified or damaged or used in a manner or purpose for which the Product was not intended, or are found not to be genuine Test Store Sleep Products.
10.9 A customer who has made a claim within 100 calendar days from delivery shall be prohibited from making another claim for return and/or refund for 200 calendar days following the claim. A customer who has returned and refunded a Product will be restricted from purchasing a unit from the same product line for 200 calendar days following the claim.



11. Service Obligations
11.1 If you end this contract in accordance with the goodwill guarantee we will pick up the mattress from the property where it is located for free. Please email us at support@emma-sleep.com.ph to arrange collection.
11.2 Test Store Sleep will supply the Purchase Services in a good, proper and professional manner and in accordance with relevant Philippine industry standards, best practice and guidelines.


12. Customer Obligations
As a Customer, you agree that you will comply with the following:
(a) use the Purchase Services only for purposes that are permitted by the Terms;
(b) that you will have the sole responsibility for protecting the confidentiality of your Login Details and/or email address;
(c) any use of your registration information by any other person, or third parties, is strictly prohibited. You agree to immediately notify Test Store Sleep of any unauthorised use of your Login Details or email address or any breach of security of which you have become aware;
(d) access and use of the Website is limited, non-transferable and allows for the sole use of the Website by you for the purposes of Test Store Sleep providing the Purchase Services.


13. Contract language and Storage of the Contract Text
This contract is offered exclusively in English. The contract text (order data and general terms and conditions) is filed and stored by us. The storage is, however, only temporary and is not accessible to you. If you wish to file and store these terms and conditions you will have to do so separately.


14. General Disclaimer
14.1 You acknowledge that Test Store Sleep does not make any terms, guarantees, warranties, representations or conditions whatsoever regarding the Products other than provided for pursuant to these Terms.
14.2 Test Store Sleep will make every effort to ensure a Product is accurately depicted on the Website, however, you acknowledge that colours and packaging may differ from what is displayed on the Website.
14.3 Nothing in these Terms limits or excludes any guarantees, warranties, representations or conditions implied or imposed by law, including the Singaporean Consumer Law (or any liability under them) which by law may not be limited or excluded.
14.4 Subject to this clause, and to the extent permitted by law:
(a) all terms, guarantees, warranties, representations or conditions which are not expressly stated in these Terms are excluded; and
(b) Test Store Sleep will not be liable for any special, indirect or consequential loss or damage, loss of profit or opportunity, or damage to goodwill arising out of or in connection with the Purchase Services or these Terms (including as a result of not being able to use the Purchase Services or the late supply of the Purchase Services), whether at common law, under contract, tort (including negligence), in equity, pursuant to statute or otherwise.
14.5 None of the affiliates, directors, officers, employees, agents, contributors, third party content providers or licensors of Test Store Sleep (including any third party where the delivery services are made available to you) make any express or implied representation or warranty about the content on the Website or any products or services (including the Products or Purchase Services of Test Store Sleep) except as provided in these Terms and on the Website. This includes (but is not restricted to) loss or damage you might suffer as a result of any of the following:
(a) failure of performance, error, omission, interruption, deletion, defect, failure to correct defects, delay in operation or transmission, computer virus or other harmful component, loss of data, communication line failure, unlawful third party conduct, or theft, destruction, alteration or unauthorised access to records;
(b) the accuracy, suitability or currency of any information on the Website, the Purchase Service, or any of its content related products (including third party material and advertisements on the Website);
(c) costs incurred as a result of you using the Website, the Purchase Services or any of the Products;
(d) the Content or operation in respect to links which are provided for the User's convenience; or
(e) any failure to complete a transaction, or any loss arising from e-commerce transacted on the Website.


15. Venue and Jurisdiction
The Purchase Services offered by Test Store Sleep is intended to be viewed by residents of Philippines. In the event of any dispute arising out of or in relation to the Website, you agree that the exclusive venue for resolving any dispute shall be in the courts of Philippines.


16. Limitation of Liability
16.1 Test Store Sleep will not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential or exemplary damages, including but not limited to, damages for loss of profit, goodwill, use, damage to property, data or other intangible losses (even if Test Store Sleep has been advised of the possibility of such damages).
16.2 We do not exclude or limit in any way our liability to you where it would be unlawful to do so. This includes liability for death or personal injury caused by our negligence or the negligence of our employees, agents or subcontractors; for fraud or fraudulent misrepresentation; for breach of your legal rights in relation to the Products.
16.3 We are not liable for business losses. We only supply the Products for domestic and private use. If you use the Products for any commercial, business or re-sale purpose we will have no liability to you for any loss of profit, loss of business, business interruption, or loss of business opportunity.
16.4 We will not be liable or responsible for any failure to perform, or delay in performance of, any of our obligations that is caused by events outside our reasonable control (“Force Majeure Event”). A Force Majeure Event includes any act, event, non-happening, omission accident or Act of God beyond our reasonable control. Our performance of the Services is deemed to be suspended for the period that the Force Majeure Event continues, and we will have an extension of time for performance for the duration of that period. We will use our reasonable endeavours to bring the Force Majeure Event to a close or to find a solution by which our obligations under the Terms may be performed despite the Force Majeure Event.


17. Copyright and Intellectual Property
17.1 The intellectual property rights in or related to the Products or any of its documentation vest in Test Store Sleep or Test Store Sleep has the right to use the intellectual property rights.
17.2 The Website, the Purchase Services and all of the related products of Test Store Sleep are subject to copyright. The material on the Website is protected by copyright under the laws of Philippines and through international treaties. Unless otherwise indicated, all rights (including copyright) in the site content and compilation of the website (including text, graphics, logos, button icons, video images, audio clips and software) (the 'Content') are owned or controlled by Test Store Sleep or its contributors.
17.3 You may not, without the prior written permission of Test Store Sleep and the permission of any other relevant rights owners: broadcast, republish, up-load to a third party, transmit, post, distribute, show or play in public, adapt or change in any way the Content or third-party contact for any purpose. This prohibition does not extend to materials on the Website which are freely available for re-use or are in the public domain.
17.4 Test Store Sleep retains all rights, title and interest in and to the Website and all related Content. Nothing you do on or in relation to the Website will transfer to you:
(a) the business name, trading name, domain name, trade mark, industrial design, patent, registered design or copyright of Test Store Sleep;
(b) the right to use or exploit a business name, trading name, domain name, trade mark or industrial design; or
(c) a system or process that is the subject of a patent, registered design or copyright (or an adaptation or modification of such a system or process).
The Website or any part of it (including, without limitation, any content or images) must not be copied, reproduced, adapted, publicly displayed, duplicated, translated or distributed in any way (including mirroring) to any other device, server, site or other medium for publication or distribution, without our express prior written consent.
17.5 The intellectual property in our Products including any trade marks, service marks, trade names and any other proprietary designations are owned, registered or licensed by us. Any other trade marks, service marks, logos, trade names and any other proprietary designations are the trade marks or property of the respective parties. You must not use any of our trade marks:
(a) in or as the whole or part of your own trade marks;
(a) in connection with activities, products or services which are not ours; or
(b) in a manner which may be confusing, misleading or deceptive.
17.6 Your obligations under this clause survive termination or expiry of these Terms.


18. Privacy Policy
18.1 In these Terms, personal information has the meaning as defined in the Privacy Laws. Privacy Laws means the Privacy Act 1988 (Cth). Please refer to our Privacy Policy which is made a part of these Terms.
18.2 If you are a non-Singaporean user of the Website, you agree that your personal information is stored in our servers in Singapore and is subject to the applicable Singaporean Privacy Laws. You accept that by providing us your personal information, we will deal with such personal information as set out in our Privacy Policy.


19. Transfer of Risk
The risk of accidental loss and accidental deterioration of the purchased goods shall be transferred to you where you are not a consumer as soon as we have handed the goods to the freight forwarder, freight carrier or other person or institution who is otherwise responsible for the shipment.


20. Service Warranty
20.1 The warranty period is one year from delivery of the goods. This does not apply to damages resulting from injury to life, body or health, which is attributable to the seller and not to gross negligence or willful deliberate damage or misrepresentation by us.
20.2 Only our details and the Product description of the Products are deemed as agreed upon; but no other advertising, public promises and statements by us.
20.3 If you are not a consumer, you are obliged to examine the goods immediately and perform due diligence on quality and quantity deviations and to notify obvious defects within 7 days from receipt of the goods to us in writing. The same applies to any defects you find later.
20.4 The warranty provided under this clause will not apply where you are not acting as a consumer and have not examined the Products and notified us of any defects.
20.5 We will fulfill the warranty in the case of defective goods at our option by repair or replacement delivery. If we fail to rectify the fault two times, you may demand a reduction or withdraw from the contract.
20.6 In the case of subsequent improvement, the buyer shall bear the increased costs resulting from the fact that the goods have been transported to a place other than the place of performance, provided that the shipment does not correspond to the intended use of the goods.


21. Product Warranty
The Test Store Original Mattress comes with a 10-year warranty on the dimensional stability and durability of the core materials. This warranty is valid from the date you receive your Test Store Original Mattress. If there is a defect in your mattress that is covered in the 10-year warranty, please contact our customer service team at support@emma-sleep.com.ph, and provide us with photos of the affected mattress and slat grate in order to process a return. This warranty covers: • Cracks, dings or damage to the foam, which have arisen despite proper use and proper handling. • In case of production damage at the zipper. This warranty does not apply: • For personal comfort preferences • In the case of damage caused, inter alia, but not exclusively by cuts, burns, cracks, liquids or stains. • Replacement of any non-damaged parts of the Test Store Original Mattress. • Any Test Store Original Mattress not supplied by an official dealer. • Any mattress that has not been sold as a new Product.


22. Extended Retention of Title
22.1 Ownership and title in the Products shall not pass to the customer until the customer has paid for the Products in full in accordance with these Terms.
22.2 Notwithstanding that risk in the Products shall pass to the customer as provided in paragraph 17, title to the Products shall remain with us until all monies owing by the customer to us have been paid in full.
22.3 Where Products are supplied by us to the customer without payment in full of all moneys payable in respect of the Products provided by us, the customer:
(a) is a bailee of the Products until property in them passes to the customer;
(b) irrevocably appoints us as its attorney to do all acts and things necessary to ensure the retention of title to Products including the registration of any security interest in favor of us with respect to the Products under applicable law;
(c) must be able upon demand by us to separate and identify as belonging to us the Products supplied by us from other products which are held by the customer;
(d) must not allow any person to have or acquire any security interest in the Products;
(e) agrees that we may repossess the Products if payment is not made within 14 days (or such longer time as we may, in our complete discretion, approve in writing) of the supply of the Products; and
(f) grants an irrevocable license to us or our agent to enter the customers premises or premises under its control in order to recover possession of Products pursuant to this paragraph.
The corresponding security rights in the Products are transferable to third parties. Prior to the transfer of ownership of the reserved Products, a buyer is not entitled to pledge the Products or to surrender them for security.
22.4 If the customer is not a consumer, notwithstanding paragraph 20 (3) the customer may transfer, sell or dispose of Products to a third party in the ordinary course of business.
22.5 We retain ownership of the Products where you are not a consumer until the complete settlement of all claims arising from a current business relationship. The corresponding security rights in the Products are transferable to third parties. Prior to the transfer of ownership of the reserved Products, a buyer is not entitled to pledge the Products or to surrender them for security.
22.6 If you are not a consumer, you are entitled to resell the Products in the ordinary course of business. In this case, the purchaser must assign all claims arising from the resale to the seller in the amount of the invoice amount. The seller accepts the assignment amount. The purchaser is also authorized to collect the debt. The seller reserves the right to collect the claim itself if the purchaser does not properly fulfill its payment obligations. In case of connection and mixing of the reserved Products, the seller acquires co-ownership of the new item in the ratio of the invoice value of the reserved Products to the other processed items at the time of the processing. The seller undertakes to release the collateral which is due to the seller at the buyer’s request insofar as the value of the collateral exceeds the claim to be secured by more than 10%. The choice of securities to be released is incumbent upon the seller.


23. Discounts and Promotions
23.1 Advertised offers and promotions are subject to the following terms and conditions, in addition to any conditions specified upon entering the relevant code at checkout:
(a) promotions are only applicable to Products specified in the offer;
(b) any specified discounts and final sale promotions may not be eligible for any other offers;
(c) you must be logged in to your Customer Account to use a promotion code;
(d) we take no responsibility for promotion codes that were not applied during the checkout process and application of discounts after an Order has been placed is left to the discretion of Test Store Sleep;
(e) Products marked ‘Final Sale’, or purchased from a promotion that specified the Products as ‘Final Sale’, cannot be returned (in the absence of any defect or fault and subject to any law to the contrary); and
(f) we reserve the right to end any promotions, sales or discount offers at any time.
23.2 Please refer to our Website for specific terms and conditions, eligibility for, and rules that apply to our special offer discounts and promotions.


24. Customer Service
Our customer service is available for questions and complaints on weekdays from 9:00 AM to 6.00 pm.
Email: support@emma-sleep.com.ph


25. Other Important Terms
25.1 If a court finds part of this contract illegal, the rest will continue in force. Each of the paragraphs of these terms operates separately. If any court or relevant authority decides that any of them are unlawful, the remaining paragraphs will remain in full force and effect.
25.2 Nobody else has any rights under this contract. This contract is between you and us. No other person shall have any rights to enforce any of its terms.
25.3 If we do not insist immediately that you do anything you are required to do under these terms, or if we delay in taking steps against you in respect of your breaking this contract, that will not mean that you do not have to do those things and it will not prevent us taking steps against you at a later date.


26. Conditions for Refer-a-Friend
26.1 In order to be eligible for the Refer-A-Friend program, you have to be an Test Store Sleep Customer and have an Test Store Sleep Customer Account.
26.2 To refer a friend, go to your Customer Account, click on the 'My referred friends' tab and enter their email address. Your friend will then receive an email with their personalised voucher code.
(a) The voucher code is only valid on purchases made on www.emma-sleep.com.ph.
(b) The minimum spend is ₱5,000.
(c) The voucher code can be used on the entire Test Store Sleep range and in conjunction with other offers and promotions.
26.3 You are entitled to the ₱500 cash reward if the referred friend keeps their Test Store Sleep Products beyond their 100-night trial period.
26.4 To receive the ₱500 cash reward, contact our customer service team by sending an email to support@emma-sleep.com.ph. Restrictions might apply.
26.5 We reserve the right to invalidate the voucher if it is made public on the internet or appears on any search engine. In this case the referrer also loses their claim to the ₱500 cash reward.
26.6 The number of cash reward pay-outs is limited to ten.
26.7 The voucher code becomes invalid and the claim to the ₱500 cash reward is lost if the referrer’s order is cancelled or if the order is returned.
26.8 The referrer and the referred cannot be the same person.
26.9 People living in the same household cannot be referred.
26.10 Customers are prohibited from using fake or multiple email addresses or customer accounts and cannot use fictious identities to take part in the Refer-A-Friend program.
26.11 We reserve the right to exclude customers from participating in this promotion, if they do not meet the necessary requirements or violate the rules in any other way.
26.12 We also reserve the right to cancel the Refer-A-Friend program without further notice.
For further questions about the Refer-A-Friend program please contact our customer service by sending an email to support@emma-sleep.com.ph


Test Store Sleep Singapore Pte. Ltd. All Rights Reserved.

settings.section-content:
Our mission is to deliver a better sleep experience across the globe. Founded in Frankfurt, Germany in 2015, Test Store has managed to expand to 22 countries on 5 continents.

Developed by our expert and award-winning team in Germany, the Test Store Mattress provides optimal spinal alignment through its patented technology. No matter your sleeping position, the Test Store Mattress gives you the comfort and support you need for a better night’s sleep.

Not only have we been named as the fastest growing start-up in Germany and Europe, but we have also won multiple awards in nearly every single country we have a presence in.

Let's be honest, at Test Store we don’t let our successes determine when our work is done, we continually strive to make advancements in comfort through innovation. With our on-site state-of-the-art testing facility, coupled with our veteran product development team, we give you the perfect mattress.

What makes Test Store different from many of our competitors is our belief in producing our products locally. Through this, not only have we been able to introduce our amazing German-engineered mattresses to different countries, but we have also been able to support the local economies, ensuring that our presence does not hurt our customers.

settings.title: How is the Test Store Mattress made?
settings.description: Learn more about how the Test Store Mattress is designed and made.

settings.block-description: Average Age of Test Store Employees

settings.section-content: Our headquarters are located in Frankfurt, Germany. We have one of the most international teams in this city and we are always eager to embrace new cultures, ideas and values.
settings.join-team-content:
We are always looking for talented candidates. Feel free to reach out to us to see if you can become a member of the Test Store family.

Test Store is a part of the Bettzeit family, a company dedicated to improving sleep quality.

Test Store Original ranked #1 Top of the mattress comparison table
Best of the test of Altroconsumo
Awarded as #1 fastest growing startup in Europe
Test Store Original elected product of the year
Test Store Hybrid awarded Best Buy
Test Store Original rated as Excellent with 9 out of 10

settings.two-col-block-description: Your brand new Test Store Original Mattress will be delivered directly to your door completely free of charge!
Once your new Test Store Original Mattress arrives, you will have 100 nights to decide whether or not it’s the perfect mattress for you. If you like it, you simply keep it.

settings.two-col-main-text: Test the Test Store Original Mattress for 100 Nights

settings.two-col-block-description: If your Test Store Original Mattress does not suit you for any reason, feel free to return it. Just contact us via phone or email, and we'll collect it at no cost to you.
We will refund you the full amount. There are no hidden fees.

settings.two-col-header: And if it's not for you?

settings.faq-question: How does the sleep trial work?
settings.faq-answer: It's simple. You can test the Test Store Original Mattress for 100 nights to decide whether or not you are satisfied with it. If you realize that Test Store is not the right mattress for you, simply contact our customer service team at support@emma-sleep.com.ph to arrange a pick-up. We will give you a refund for 100% of the purchase price. However, we do ask that you give yourself time to get used to your new mattress so we recommend testing your Test Store for at least 3 - 4 weeks before sending it back.

settings.faq-question: Shouldn't I first test a mattress in person before purchasing it?
settings.faq-answer: We believe that our mattresses provide the perfect night's sleep for 99% of our customers. The mattress industry is aimed at confusing customers with excess supply, pushy sales tactics and high prices. We want to make sure your mattress buying experience is as simple and carefree as possible. That is why we offer everyone the chance to test the Test Store Original Mattress for 100 nights risk-free. If you do not enjoy it, simply email us and we’ll pick it up free of charge.

settings.faq-question: When does the sleep trial start?
settings.faq-answer: It starts on the day of delivery. From the day you receive your Test Store Original Mattress, you can test it risk-free for 100 days.

settings.faq-question: Does the mattress have to stay in the plastic wrap during the trial?
settings.faq-answer: No, it doesn’t. We want you to have the best sleep possible and that should not include sleeping on noisy plastic. The Test Store Original Mattress is vacuum sealed in plastic and roll packed for delivery to your home. Upon receiving your new Test Store Original Mattress, carefully remove the plastic using a pair of scissors. A guideline for how to properly unwrap your Test Store is provided in your package as well. Within a few minutes, your mattress will magically self-inflate and will be ready for you to sleep on.

settings.faq-question: How can I return my Test Store Mattress within the trial time?
settings.faq-answer: When you want to return your Test Store Original Mattress, simply email our customer service team. The mattress will be picked up by our return partner at zero cost to you. You will receive a refund within 14 days of pickup.

settings.title: The Test Store A - Z everything you need to know about mattresses

settings.q: How is the Test Store Original Mattress created?
settings.a: The Test Store Original Mattress consists of three different layers: Breathable and bouncy eco-friendly foam on top with an open-pore cell structure that enables pleasant air circulation while keeping you cool, even on warm nights. Pressure-relieving, zoning comfort foam in the middle that ensures optimum pressure relief and molds to the shape of your body. Supportive point-elastic foam on the bottom that provides your with support and adds to the durability of the mattress.

settings.q: What makes the Test Store Original Mattress special?
settings.a: Test Store smoothly combines high-quality materials to create a dream-like mattress that conforms to every body type. Through the combination of our extensive research and advanced foam technology, Test Store allows you to get the comfiest sleep possible. The Test Store Original Mattress offers comfort point-elastic caving that enables an ideal and unique fit for your body. As a result, your spine stays straight while at the same time offering you the necessary amount of support and comfort. The innovative eco-friendly top layer optimally relieves the individual body parts and guarantees a cooling effect while you sleep thanks to its breathability. The high quality foams used to make Test Store are created in Germany. The processed materials are all fine, durable and produced at top quality facilities.

settings.q: How is the Test Store Original Mattress shipped?
settings.a: In the final step of production the Test Store Original Mattress is vacuum-packed and rolled. It is then packed into a stylish box with dimensions of 38x38x110cm or 45x45x110cm. We ship throughout Singapore directly to your front door using our courier.

settings.q: How does the 100 Night Trial work?
settings.a: At Test Store we believe it takes time to truly appreciate your new mattress so we recommend sleeping on it for a few weeks to realize the difference. We offer the option to test Test Store for 100 nights risk-free. If the Test Store Original Mattress is not perfect for any reason, we will pick it up and issue a full refund.

settings.q: Does the Test Store Original Mattress require a special slat frame?
settings.a: No, the Test Store is a low-maintenance mattress that is able to lay on any surface. It doesn't matter whether it is lying on the ground, on a box spring or on a slatted bed base, the Test Store is a mattress that fits every lifestyle. The most important thing is that the surface is clean and dry. You should have no problem using the Test Store Original Mattress with a slatted frame.

settings.q: How does the 100 Night Trial work?
settings.a: It's simple. You can test all the Test Store products for 100 days to decide whether or not you are satisfied with our product. If you realise that Test Store is not right for you, simply contact our customer service team (support@emma-sleep.com.ph) to arrange a pick-up date and issue you a full refund. However, we do ask that you give yourself time to get used to your new mattress so we recommend testing Test Store for at least 3 - 4 weeks before sending her back.

settings.q: Shouldn't I test a mattress first in person before purchasing?
settings.a: We believe that our mattresses provide an exceptionally relaxing and comfortable sleep to 99% of our customers. The mattress industry is aimed at confusing customers with excess supply, pushy sales tactics and high prices. We want to make sure your mattress buying experience is as simple and carefree as possible. That is why we offer our customers the chance to test the Test Store Original Mattress for 100 days risk free. If you do not enjoy it, just simply e-mail us and we’ll pick it up free of charge.

settings.q: When does the 100 night trial start?
settings.a: It starts on the day of delivery. From the day you receive your Test Store Original Mattress, you can test it risk free for 100 days.

settings.q: How can I return my mattress within the trial time?
settings.a: When you want to return your Test Store Original Mattress, simply email our customer service team and we will arrange the pickup of your mattress by our return partner at zero cost to you. You will receive a refund within 14 days of the pickup.

settings.q: What condition can I return the mattress in?
settings.a: It is not necessary to keep the box or plastic packaging when returning your Test Store Original Mattress. We would appreciate if the mattress is returned in good condition.

settings.q: Does the mattress need to stay in its plastic during the trial?
settings.a: No, it doesn’t. We want you to have the best sleep possible and that should not include sleeping on noisy plastic. The Test Store Original Mattress is vacuum sealed in plastic and roll packed for delivery to your home. Upon receiving your new Test Store Original Mattress, carefully remove the plastic wrap using our handy cutting tool included in your welcome package. A guideline for how to properly unwrap your Test Store Original Mattress is provided in your package as well. Within a couple of hours, your mattress will self-inflate and will be ready for you to sleep on.

settings.q: When does the 10 year warranty start?
settings.a: The trial begins as soon as you receive your Test Store Original Mattress.

settings.q: What does the 10 year warranty cover?
settings.a: We offer a 10 year warranty on dimensional stability and durability of the core materials. For more information please check our Terms and Conditions.

settings.q: I received a defective mattress, what do I do?
settings.a: Please contact us immediately so we can send you a replacement mattress, free of charge. You can send us an email to: support@emma-sleep.com.ph

settings.q: What makes the Test Store Original Mattress special?
settings.a: Test Store smoothly combines high-quality materials to create a dream-like mattress that conforms to every body type. Through the combination of our extensive research and advanced foam technology, Test Store allows you to get the comfiest sleep possible. The Test Store Original Mattress offers comfort point-elastic caving that enables an ideal and unique fit for your body. As a result, your spine stays straight while at the same time offering you the necessary amount of support and comfort. The innovative eco-friendly top layer optimally relieves the individual body parts and guarantees a cooling effect while you sleep thanks to its breathability. The high quality foams used to make Test Store are created in Germany. The processed materials are all fine, durable and produced at top quality facilities.

settings.q: What is the Test Store Original Mattress made from?
settings.a:
The Test Store Original Mattress consists of three different layers:

Eco-friendly foam: breathable as it wicks away moisture and stops you from overheating. It’s also wonderfully bouncy, for sweet slumbers every night.

Pressure-relieving, zoning foam: ensures optimum pressure relief and molds to the shape of your body

Supportive point-elastic foam: provides durability and support

settings.q: How can a mattress be suitable for everyone?
settings.a: We worked long and hard to find the perfect composition for our Test Store Mattress and have found the optimum balance between support and comfort. While most customers are very satisfied with the Test Store Original Mattress, there are of course exceptions. That is why we offer our stress-free 100 night sleep trial so you can decide for yourself.

settings.q: What sizes is the Test Store Original Mattress available in?
settings.a:
The Test Store Original Mattress is available in a variety of sizes:

Single (190 x 90 cm)

Queen (190 x 150 cm)

King (190 x 180 cm)

settings.q: How deep/high is the mattress?
settings.a: The Test Store Original Mattress is 25cm high.

settings.q: Does the foam smell?
settings.a: Like all new products, the Test Store Original Mattress has a slight "new" smell at the start. Since we exclusively use high-grade materials, this slight smell will wear off after the first few hours. Make sure the mattress is aired out in a well ventilated room.

settings.q: How firm is the Test Store Original Mattress?
settings.a: The Test Store Original Mattress is categorized as a medium firmness mattress, this offers more natural spinal alignment for the user as it has better zoning, making it ideal for people who struggle with back pain. On a scale of 1-10, with 1 being very soft and 10 being very firm, we rate the Test Store Original Mattress a 6-7.

settings.q: Is the Test Store Original Mattress vegan?
settings.a: Yes, the Test Store Original Mattress is 100 % vegan and does not contain any animal based materials. Unfortunately the mattress is inedible.

settings.q: Why is the Test Store Original Mattress so much more affordable compared to other mattresses from a specialized dealer?
settings.a: Our mattress comes directly from the factory to you. We skip the elegant showrooms and fussy salespeople in order to save you time and money. We skipped on the frills in order to give our customers a lower - and fair - price without skimping on quality.

settings.q: How can I wash my Test Store products?
settings.a: You can easily wash your Test Store cover. You just open the zip and separate the top from the bottom part. Treat your Test Store like your favorite shirt, by washing both, the top and bottom part, at 60°C in the washing machine. Because of the special fibre used in the cover with the high dampness releasing function it will only be a little clammy coming out of the machine. You can also wash single stains off by hand with a gentle washing detergent.

settings.q: How is the Test Store Original Mattress created?
settings.a: The Test Store Original Mattress consists of three different layers: Breathable and bouncy eco-friendly foam on top with an open-pore cell structure that enables pleasant air circulation while keeping you cool, even on warm nights. Pressure-relieving, zoning comfort foam in the middle that ensures optimum pressure relief and molds to the shape of your body. Supportive point-elastic foam on the bottom that provides your with support and adds to the durability of the mattress.

settings.q: Is the Test Store Original Mattress considered a medical device?
settings.a: No, it is not a medical device.

settings.q: How long can my Test Store Original Mattress stay in the box for?
settings.a: The Test Store Original Mattress shouldn't be left rolled up in the box for more than two weeks after delivery as this may damage your mattress.

settings.q: Can I use an electric blanket?
settings.a: Yes! The Test Store Original Mattress is suitable and safe to use with an electric blanket.

settings.q: I have back or neck pain, is Test Store Original Mattress the right mattress for me?
settings.a: We understand that needs vary by individuals so we offer a 100 night trial to test the Test Store Original Mattress risk-free. That way you can decide if it is best for your situation.

settings.q: Do I need to flip and ventilate it?
settings.a: Flipping your Test Store Original Mattress is not necessary and the white top-cover and breathable eco-friendly foam layer should always remain on top. The three-layer build-up form serves as an especially long lived function of support, so the usual flipping of the mattress isn’t necessary. The special breathability and open-cell character of the core materials provide a self-contained ventilation system, keeping the mattress aerated.

settings.q: Does the Test Store require a special slat frame?
settings.a: No! The Test Store is a low-maintenance mattress. It is able to lay on any surface. It doesn't matter whether it is lying on the ground, on a box spring or on a slat frame, Test Store is a mattress that fits every lifestyle. The most important thing is that the surface is clean and dry. The only thing we recommend is that the slats are not further than 5cm apart.

settings.q: Does it need a topper or bed cover?
settings.a: Because the Test Store Original Mattress already comes with a very soft and durable cover you do not need to purchase any additional mattress protection. A mattress topper, a mattress pad or a mattress protector is not necessary. Test Store's cover can be washed easily in your washing machine. If you still wish to add your own cover, any standard bed/mattress cover will fit .

settings.q: Does the Test Store Original Mattress fit on any bed frame?
settings.a: Yes, the Test Store Original Mattress fits on any bed frame.

settings.q: Where can I use my discount/coupon code?
settings.a: You can use your coupon in the last step of the order process. Just enter the code in the field below the total price. Click on 'apply coupon' and the revised total will be shown.

settings.q: What if my discount doesn't work?
settings.a: If you experience an error when inputing your discount code, please contact us at support@emma-sleep.com.ph.

settings.q: Can I use discount combinations?
settings.a: Yes, you are able to use the friend referral, the newsletter and any other discount codes at the same time.

settings.q: What payment methods do you offer?
settings.a: You can pay securely using Mastercard, Visa, Manual Bank Transfer, Virtual Bank Transfer and *e-Wallet. Your credit or debit card data is encrypted via a safe SSL-method.​ *e-Wallet options only available at Singapore, Indonesia and Malaysia. Later, it will change to GoPay/GrabPay.

settings.q: Can I order by phone?
settings.a: Sorry, due to security reasons we don’t accept orders by phone. We have designed the Test Store Sleep website as a convenient way through which all our customers can use and submit payments.​ Check Test Store products on your favorite marketplaces for other payment methods:​ Lazada: (Linked to Test Store LazMall)​ Shopee: (Linked to Test Store Shopee Mall)​

settings.q: Can we do bank transfer from overseas bank?​
settings.a: We do not recommend bank transfer using foreign bank account. Using (the country) bank account would be the safest and the fastest way to submit your payment.​

settings.q: How long will it take for my payment to be verified?​​
settings.a: Mastercard, Visa, Virtual Bank Transfer, and e-Wallet will be automatically confirmed by our system.​ While for manual bank transfer, it will take within 1x24 hour for Test Store team to check and confirm your payment.​

settings.q: How do I change/edit my order?
settings.a:
After purchasing your mattress, please contact the customer service team for all changes that are needed including address change, mattresses size changes, payment changes, cancellation, or delivery dates. You can reach us at 
support@emma-sleep.com.ph

settings.a:
After purchasing your mattress, please contact the customer service team for all changes that are needed including address change, mattresses size changes, payment changes, cancellation, or delivery dates. You can reach us at 
support@emma-sleep.com.ph.

settings.q: How do I cancel my order?
settings.a: If you would like to cancel your order, our customer service team will be happy to help you. Simply contact us via e-mail (put your order number in the subject line).

settings.q: How do I contact customer service?
settings.a: If you would like to contact us, please feel free to email our support team at: support@emma-sleep.com.ph.

settings.q: What are the shipping/delivery costs?
settings.a: Shipping and return costs are free. We want you to happily await your new Test Store Original Mattress without concern for pesky shipping costs.

settings.q: How long does delivery take?
settings.a: The estimated delivery time can be looked up under “order”. Please take into account that your order will be send to our production team once full payment is received and your order will be delivered within the prescribed delivery time. Depending on the payment method this can take a couple of days.

settings.q: How many deliveries do I get when I order more than one product?
settings.a: Each Test Store product will be sent separately. You will receive a tracking number and confirmation email for each parcel.

settings.q: Can I change my delivery address?
settings.a:
After purchasing your mattress, please contact the customer service team for all changes that are needed including address change, mattresses size changes, payment changes, cancellation, or delivery dates. You can reach us at 
support@emma-sleep.com.ph.

settings.q: Can I change the date of my delivery?
settings.a:
After purchasing your mattress, please contact the customer service team for all changes that are needed including address change, mattresses size changes, payment changes, cancellation, or delivery dates. You can reach us at 
support@emma-sleep.com.ph.

settings.q: How does shipping work?
settings.a:
Customers will receive an email when the mattress is ready to leave the local warehouse. A tracking number and link tracker will be attached in the email to help the customers see live updates on their Test Store Mattress' shipment process.

When a customer receives the order, an email for delivery confirmation will also be sent to them. For delivery inquiries, you may contact support@janio.asia

settings.q: Can I order first and get it delivered on a specific day?
settings.a: It is possible to delay your delivery, however it is not possible to choose a specific date. The date you select for the delay your order option is the date in which the order gets processed. Therefore, if you want to place an order now and receive it in the future, you can choose a later dispatch date and your order will arrive with you several working days from the date selected!

settings.q: Where can I track my order?
settings.a: As soon as your mattress is dispatched you will be sent tracking information via SMS to let you know exactly when you will receive your Test Store Original Mattress.

settings.q: What is Cash-on-Delivery (COD)?​
settings.a: It’s one of payment methods that Test Store Sleep offers to our customers where the payment is made on delivery.​

settings.q: How do I purchase Test Store Sleep’s products via Cash-on Delivery (COD)?​​
settings.a:
Follow these steps to use Cash-on-Delivery as your payment method:

1. Tap on “Cash-On-Delivery” at our checkout page

2. Proceed your order​

3. Whilst waiting for our courier to deliver your package right at your doorstep, you may relax. However, be sure to prepare the money.​

4. You should hand in the cash to our courier before you unbox the package​

5. If you decline the payment or you are not present during the delivery *within 2x in 60 days period, your package will be cancelled and returned to our warehouse​​

settings.q: Which delivery courier that offers the Cash-on-Delivery?​
settings.a:
Test Store Sleep is working together with:

1. XXX

2. XXX

For more information regarding Cash-on-Delivery, please contact our partner at support@janio.asia

settings.q: What do I do if I haven't received my welcome pack?
settings.a: We hope that every customer receives their welcome pack but we understand that packing mistakes can happen. If you happen to experience this, please contact customer service via e-mail.

settings.q: What will I get in the welcome package?
settings.a: In the welcome booklet, you will find information on how to unbox the Test Store Mattress, along with other FAQ´s and information.

settings.q: Is there a right way to unpack the mattress?
settings.a: The Test Store Mattress is packed with convenience in mind. Just unbox, roll the mattress out, remove the plastic wrap, and you're ready for sleeping!

settings.q: How long can the mattress stay in the box?
settings.a: In order to experience optimal comfort, we recommend that the mattress is not left in the box any longer than 2 weeks.

settings.q: After unpacking the Test Store Mattress, how long does it take for the mattress to be ready for use?
settings.a: You can sleep right away but we recommend waiting up to 2 hours for the mattress to become fully expanded.

settings.q: What if I ordered the wrong size?
settings.a:
After purchasing your mattress, please contact the customer service team for all changes that are needed including address change, mattresses size changes, payment changes, cancellation, or delivery dates. You can reach us at 
support@emma-sleep.com.ph.

settings.q: The mattress doesn’t look like the right size, what do I do?
settings.a: Please contact the customer service team for all changes that are needed including address change, mattresses size changes, payment changes, cancellation, or delivery dates. You can reach us at support@emma-sleep.com.ph. Please note that the mattress does inflate in both width and depth. This means that the mattress can initially look like a smaller size whilst it is vacuum packed. Please remove the vacuum packing and watch the mattress inflate to the correct size before your eyes!

settings.q: How do I start the return process?
settings.a: When you want to return your Test Store Mattress simply e-mail our customer service team and we will arrange for a pickup at zero cost to you.

settings.q: How does the return process work?
settings.a: After we initiate a return for you, one of the collection companies we work with will contact you via telephone within 5-7 business days to organise a suitable date for collection.

settings.q: How do refunds work?
settings.a: As soon as the return has arrived at our warehouse after pickup, we will then issue your refund. Please bare in mind that the refund may take up to 2 weeks to process depending on the payment method you used.

settings.q: What is the status of my refund?
settings.a: Please contact customer service to check the status of your refund via our customer support email:  support@emma-sleep.com.ph

settings.q: How do I unpack my Test Store mattress?
settings.a:
It's easy to unpack your Test Store mattress so it's ready for use:

1. Place the mattress box near your bed frame or the clear space where you'll be placing the mattress.

2. Open the top of the box and tilt it until it's laid out horizontally on the floor. You can then carefully pull the vacuum-packed mattress out.

3. Use scissors or the included cutter to cut open the first layer of plastic. Make sure that the clear space around you is enough for the unrolled mattress to be laid flat. You can also choose to unroll the mattress on top of your bed frame.

4. Once the mattress is fully unrolled, slit open one side of the last layer of plastic around the mattress itself to let air inflate the mattress.

5. While the mattress is inflating itself, you can slowly slide off the last layer of plastic. While you can use the mattress during the mattress without it during the 100-night trial, we ask that you keep it until your trial ends.This is because in the event that you wish to return or replace your mattress, our courier requires that it be wrapped in plastic.

6. It takes 20 minutes for the mattress to inflate enough for use. Any large or visible dips that result from storage in the warehouse should also inflate and decompress after 2 hours.

7. You should now be all set to unwind and stretch out on your beautiful, new mattress.

You can also find a video tutorial on how to unpack your mattress at https://youtu.be/BInK_ARfhHo.

settings.q: After unpacking the Test Store Mattress, how long does it take for the mattress to be ready for use?
settings.a: Your Test Store Original should inflate enough that it's ready to sleep on after a couple of hours. However, it may take up to 48 hours for the mattress to inflate to its full height and width and remove all the dips in the mattress.

settings.q: What do I do if I haven't received my welcome pack?
settings.a:
The welcome package is a booklet where you will find information on how to unbox the Test Store Mattress. There's also other FAQs and information that you may find useful.

We hope that every customer receives their welcome pack but we understand that packing mistakes can happen. If you happen to experience this, please contact customer service via e-mail.

settings.q: How long can the mattress stay in the box?
settings.a: We recommend that the mattress is not left, unpacked, in the box for longer than 2 weeks.

settings.q: How long can the mattress stay in the box?
settings.a: Please contact the customer service team at support@emma-sleep.com.ph so we can assist you further. The mattress does inflate in both width and depth after 24-48 hours. This means that the mattress can initially be a smaller size while still vacuum-packed or before it fully inflates.

settings.q: How does Refer a Friend work?
settings.a: First create an account and invite your friends, then we will send your friend a voucher for $50. Your friends can then use the code to get $50 off their purchase of an Test Store Original Mattress. At the end of your friend's 100 night trial, please contact Test Store customer service team to receive your $50.

settings.q: When do I get the $50 and when will my friend receive their $50?
settings.a: Your friend will get their $50 discount when they purchase an Test Store Original Mattress using the voucher code in their email. You will receive your $50 at the end of your friend's 100 night trial by contacting our Test Store customer service team.

settings.q: What details am I supposed to submit to get my $50?
settings.a: Please give us your order number and your friend's order number or email address.

settings.q: How do I create a customer account?
settings.a: You can easily create a customer account when ordering. Just check the box that says, "Yes, I want to create an account". Or you can go to the bottom of the website and click Sign In or Out and then you can create an account using your order number.

settings.q: How do I retrieve my password?
settings.a: Please use the 'Forgot Your Password?' option located on the login page on our website. It will walk you through resetting your password.

settings.section-title: How the Mattress in a Box Works
settings.section-content: The Test Store Mattresses are cleverly packaged in an easy-to-move cardboard box. We use a special vacuum process to gently compress and roll your mattress, so even the largest mattress can fit inside. This space-saving method isn't just kinder to the environment, taking up less space on our delivery trucks and allowing us to transport more in one go, but it also means we're able to get the mattresses to you much quicker.

settings.section-title: Don't Lose Sleep Over Your Mattress in a Box Delivery
Test Store Mattress in a Box
settings.section-content: Since the mattress can be shipped like a normal package and you don't have to hire a whole moving team, your Test Store Mattress will arrive in just 4-7 working days! It's made easy to set up within minutes! Get your pajamas ready because once the plastic wrapping is opened, your Test Store Mattress will inflate by itself and offer all its dreamy comfort.

settings.section-title: What else can make you sleep even better after this easy process?
settings.section-content: We want you to get the best night's sleep, that's why we're not just committed to giving you the best products. We've simplified the ordering process and are more than happy to offer you free delivery and returns.

settings.section-title: Setup the Test Store Mattress in Minutes!
settings.section-content: The mattress is so easy to set up, you could do it in your sleep! First, bring the mattress in a box close to the bed or location where it will be set up and then simply take the memory foam mattress out and unroll it on the bed or a flat surface. Once the plastic package is safely cut open, the memory foam mattress takes in air and gets back to its normal form on its own. Next, carefully cut the rest of the plastic, making sure not to cut the washable mattress cover. Then get your pajamas ready and remove the plastic because, voila, your bed in a box is set up and ready for a great night's sleep!

settings.title: The Test Store Original: Mattress in a Box

settings.mattress-col-text: Why not sleep on it? Try your Test Store Mattress for 100 nights risk-free.
We want you to rest easy. Your Test Store Mattress is guaranteed for 10 years.
Delivery is a breeze. Your Test Store Mattress is delivered right to your door, free.

settings.title: Quality Guaranteed
settings.content:
Each Test Store Original Mattress comes with a 10 year warranty on the dimensional stability and durability of the mattress core. This warranty is valid from the date you receive your new Test Store Original Mattress, and is valid for the first 10 years of use. Terms and conditions apply.

If you have a problem with your mattress that is covered in the 10 year warranty, please contact our customer service team and provide us with corresponding photos of the affected product and we will swap it with a brand new Test Store Original Mattress. The warranty covers:

-cracks, dents or damage to the foam, which have arisen despite proper use and proper handling

-production damage to the zipper

settings.faq-question: When does the 10 year warranty start?
settings.faq-answer: The trial begins as soon as you receive your Test Store Original Mattress.

settings.faq-question: I received a defective mattress, what do I do?
settings.faq-answer: Please contact us immediately so we can send you a replacement mattress, free of charge. You can send us an email at support@emma-sleep.com.ph

settings.title: Free Delivery & Returns
settings.content: We ship all Test Store Original Mattresses directly to your doorstep with no extra costs. After your new Test Store is vacuum-packed and rolled into a compact box, it is ready to be shipped to you via Janio.

settings.faq-answer: Shipping and return costs are free. We want you to happily await your new Test Store Original Mattress without concern for pesky shipping costs.

settings.faq-question: How does the delivery process work?
settings.faq-answer:
Customers will receive an email when the mattress is ready to leave the local warehouse. A tracking number and link tracker will be attached in the email to help the customers see live updates on their Test Store Mattress' shipment process.

When a customer receives the order, an email for delivery confirmation will also be sent to them. For delivery inquiries, you may contact support@janio.asia

The estimated delivery time can be looked up under “order”. Please take into account that your order will be sent to our production team once full payment is received and your order will be delivered within the prescribed delivery time. Depending on the payment method this can take a couple of days.

settings.faq-question: How long until my new Test Store Original Mattress is ready to be slept on?
settings.faq-answer: The Test Store Original Mattress only needs a few minutes to expand to its actual size after unpacking. When it has completely expanded, it is ready to be slept on.

settings.title: Unpack
settings.text: Remove the Test Store Original Mattress from the box.

settings.title: Unroll
settings.text: Unroll the mattress onto a flat surface and use scissors to gently cut and remove the plastic.

settings.title: Sleep
settings.text: Your Test Store Original Mattress needs only a few hours to expand. After it expands to its full size, it is ready to be slept on.

settings.section-title: Mattress in a Box. It doesn't get any easier.

settings.title: Opening Soon
settings.newsletter_form_heading: Be the first to know when we launch.
settings.newsletter_form_subheading: Promotions, new products and sales. Directly to your inbox.
